data.title: The Protector
data.meta_description: Ken Conway gets a job offer to look into thelocation of a missing scientist. The scientist was working for pharmaceutical researcher Dr. Krago, so Conway infiltrates the doctor's operation. After he discovers Krago's scheme Ken tries to take this information to the authorities but finds out too late that he has been infected with the doctor's latest creation. He has only 48 hours left to live.
